metadata table for encode components of bedbase

meta_2021_03_09.Rd

metadata table for encode components of bedbase

meta_2021_03_09

Format

data.frame

Note

A column "cell_type_onto" was added, after searching UBERON, Cell Ontology, Cell Line Ontology for exact matches (module 'cell' in Cell Line Ontology), using ontoProc images in Bioc 3.12.

Examples

names(meta_2021_03_09)

#>  [1] "md5sum"         "sample_name"    "file_name"      "genome"        
#>  [5] "exp_protocol"   "cell_type"      "target"         "data_source"   
#>  [9] "file_acc"       "format"         "format_type"    "description"   
#> [13] "cell_type_onto"
head(meta_2021_03_09)
